CareService.name: CareService
CareService.description: Represents a healthcare treatment, service, or procedure offered by a provider, practitioner, or facility.

Description.description: The description of the healthcare service.

IsAppointmentRequired.description: Indicates whether an appointment is required for access to this service (true) or not required (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the record.

ReferralMethods.description: Specifies the referral method for the service.

ServiceProvision.description: Specifies the conditions under which the service is provided.
